card_text: Target up to 3 "Mathmech" monsters in your GY with different names, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Special Summon them, but their effects are negated, then, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 "Mathmech" Synchro Monster using only those monsters, and shuffle the materials into the Deck instead of sending them to the GY.$N●Special Summon them, but their effects are negated, then, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "Mathmech" Xyz Monster using only those monsters.$NYou can only activate 1 "Mathmech Superfactorial" per turn.
